One of the most known and popular skill (not just reaction time, the teamplay and knowing the tactics matter) shooter.
The sad news - there are too many cheaters, it started about 4 years ago, and still it is possible to see them often.

As a player with 1k hours, I can say this game is hella good. If you don't have prime matchmaking your chances of meeting a cheater is not a lot anymore since they updated their anti cheat. I give this game a 9/10.
